tacztweaks.config.title: TaCZ Tweaks
tacztweaks.config.gun.reloadWhileShootin: Allows reloading guns immediately after shooting
tacztweaks.config.gun.allowUnload.name: Allow Unload
tacztweaks.config.gun.allowUnload.descri: Enables or disables the gun unload feature
tacztweaks.config.crawl.enabled.name: Enabled
tacztweaks.config.crawl.enabled.descript:
Enables or disables the TaCZ' crawling feature completely
Allows other crawl mods to function properly with TaCZ
Changes the upper pitch limit while crawling
Changes the lower pitch limit while crawling
tacztweaks.config.crawl.dynamicPitchLimi: Changes the pitch limit dynamically based on block collisions
tacztweaks.config.crawl.visualTweak.name: Visual Tweak
tacztweaks.config.crawl.visualTweak.desc: Tweaks the crawling animation to look more natural
Allows bullets to damage correct body parts
tacztweaks.config.compat.vsCollisionComp: Allows bullets to properly collide with Valkyrien Skies ships
tacztweaks.config.compat.vsExplosionComp: Allows explosive bullets to damage and knockback Valkyrien Skies ships
